problem_text_cn: 如图,四边形ABCD内接于⊙O,E为BC延长线上一点,∠A=50°,则∠DCE的度数为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the quadrilateral ABCD is inscribed in ⊙O, E is a point on the BC extended line, ∠A = N_0, then the degree of ∠DCE is ()
raw_answer:
解:连接OB,OD,∵∠DOB与∠A都对⁀{BD},∠DOB(大于平角的角)与∠BCD都对⁀{DAB},∴∠DOB=2∠A,∠DOB(大于平角的角)=2∠BCD,∵∠DOB+∠DOB(大于平角的角)=360°,∴∠A+∠BCD=180°,∵∠DCE+∠BCD=180°,∴∠DCE=∠A=50°,
故选:B．
